utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Hello! How can I help you?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Hi, I would like to find a hotel.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: What else can you tell me about the hotel?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Find a hotel near the beachfront.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay beachfront in which town?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Oxnard California.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: My price range is $300 for a night.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Is that all?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: No. I want a room with a balcony.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay, what else?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I will stay on next year June 16th to 19th, 2017.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Alright.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Let me describe a couple of options you can choose from.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Staybridge Suites Carlsbad, it's $145 per night. It's rated 4.5 stars. Warm suites with kitchens in a relaxed property featuring an outdoor pool, a gym & a BBQ area.

segments.text: Warm suites with kitchens in a relaxed property featuring an outdoor pool, a gym & a BBQ area

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Park Hyatt Aviara resort Golf Club and Spa, it's $279 per night. It’s rated 4.8 stars. Resort offering an 18-hole golf course, an outdoor pool & tennis courts plus a spa & fine dining.

segments.text: Park Hyatt Aviara resort Golf Club and Spa
Resort offering an 18-hole golf course, an outdoor pool & tennis courts plus a spa & fine dining

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Those are the two options. Which one do you want?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I want the second one, it looks great for me.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Tell me more about the second one.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: What would you like to know?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Does hotel have a fitness center?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Yes, it does.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Thank you.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay, thank you.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I'd like to find out more about the hotel I want to stay at.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Hi, how can I help you?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: What hotel is it?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Park City Peaks Hotel in Park City, Utah. I'd like to stay there from December 20th to December 27th, 2016.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: That's all for now. Thank you.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay. I can check availability.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I'd like to know if that is near ski slopes.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: It is about 1 mile away.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Is there a full bar? Is it kid friendly? And is it formal or casual?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: let me check on that for you. One second. Here is the Hotel which you are looking for. There is a sports bar at the hotel.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Bye. Have a nice day.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Thank you Anything else?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Great they have a sport bar. Any special activity center duties and does the room have a balcony, cable TV, a mini-fridge, coffee and honor bar and a fireplace.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Can you list those one at a time.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: A balcony or terrace, a TV with cable, mini fridge, coffee maker, honor bar and fireplace.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I'd like to find out more about the hotel, I plan to stay at Homeland final episode.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay, what else can you tell me? Would you mind saying that again?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Squaw Valley California.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: And my date of Janine will be between 22-24 December.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay. What would you like to know?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I would like to know that the hotel near to downtown or not?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Yes, the hotel is near downtown.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: And is there any restaurant near the hotel?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: There are plenty of restaurants near the hotel.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Does this restaurant have a full bar in it?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Yes, some restaurants have a full bar.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: And does the hotel have pool with hot tub and fitness center?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Yes, the hotel has a hot tub and a fitness center.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Does the room have balcony or a terrace?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Yes, the rooms have a balcony.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Does it have mini fridge or coffee maker?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Yes, they have mini fridges.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: And what will be the price of the room?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: For your dates it'll be around $349 per night.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: That sound great. Thank you so much for your help.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Are you excited to go to Squaw Valley?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Nope. I have some work to complete.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Why are you not going to Squaw Valley then?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: No, I'm going there.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: You're going there but you're not excited.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I'm super excited.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: I'm happy for you.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay, thank you so much.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: People need vacations to rewind and relax.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Yes, that's true.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Do you agree?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Yes, absolutely.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Great!

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay, bye bye.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Goodbye.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Hello. How can I help you?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Hi, I'd like to find a hotel in Laguna Beach, California.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay, what dates will you be travelling?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: June 7th to the 13th.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: I'm sorry, Can you repeat that please?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: June 7th to the 13th.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay, June 7th to the 13th.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I need it to have at least three stars.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Do you have a Max price point?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: $200 a night.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: What amenities are you looking for?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I just need it to have two double beds. I need to have parking. And I want it to be near the beach.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay, sounds good. Let me see what I can find. Hold on a second. I found two hotels.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Which one has the best customer reviews?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: The best hotel with the best customer reviews would be at the Laguna Beach Inn.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: How far away is it from the beach?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: The beach is three minutes from the hotel.

segments.text: The beach is three minutes from the hotel

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Does it have any restaurant or bars nearby?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Let me check that for you. Hold on a second. This hotel is within 10 minutes of downtown. So, there are plenty of restaurants nearby.

segments.text: This hotel is within 10 minutes of downtown

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay. I just need the address.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Sure thing.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Sure thing, here is their address: 2020 s Coast Hwy, Laguna Beach, CA 92651.

segments.text: 2020 s Coast Hwy, Laguna Beach, CA 92651

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Thank you very much.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: You're welcome. Anything else I can do for you?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: That's it.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Great, enjoy your trip.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: How can I help you?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: I'd like help in finding a hotel in San Francisco.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: May I know your dates for stay?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: March 7th to the 10th.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: How many guests will join you?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: One.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Do you have any hotel class preference?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Three stars or better.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Cool, do you have any other specific preferences?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: And less than $200 a night.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Which location is preferable?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Closest to the baseball stadium.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Okay, hold on for a while.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Let me help you in finding one.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: I have found one for you.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Courtyard by Marriott San Francisco Downtown and the cost is $179.

segments.text: Courtyard by Marriott San Francisco Downtown

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Do they offer free breakfast?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Modern hotel with an indoor pool, a restaurant & a coffee shop, plus free WiFi.

segments.text: Modern hotel with an indoor pool, a restaurant & a coffee shop, plus free WiFi

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: What type of room do they offer?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Contemporary rooms offer free WiFi and flat-screen TVs, plus desks, mini fridges and coffeemakers. Suites and upgraded rooms add pull-out sofas, and some feature whirlpool tubs. Social spaces include a living room-style lobby with fire pits, plus an outdoor courtyard.

segments.text: Social spaces include a living room-style lobby with fire pits, plus an outdoor courtyard
living room-style lobby with fire pits

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: The American restaurant serves breakfast, a grill restaurant serves dinner, and there's an on-site Starbucks. Other amenities include an indoor pool and an exercise room, plus a business center and 20 meeting rooms.

segments.text: The American restaurant serves breakfast, a grill restaurant serves dinner, and there's an on-site Starbucks. Other amenities include an indoor pool and an exercise room, plus a business center and 20 meeting rooms

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: How much is a room with two beds?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: What is the next cheapest hotel that meets that criteria?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: One moment please.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: We have Hotel Triton for $139.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: What is the customer review rating of that hotel?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: How far away is that hotel from the baseball park?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: It's just a 15 min from there.

segments.text: It's just a 15 min from there

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Is that walking or driving?

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Driving 1.7 miles in distance.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Okay. I'll take a room there.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Do you want me to book a room for you?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Yes.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Can you mention the dates please?

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: March 7th to 10th.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Yes, it is confirmed from march 7th to 10th.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: Thank you.

utterances.speaker: ASSISTANT
utterances.text: Have a nice day.

utterances.speaker: USER
utterances.text: You too.
